i_guest_data.name: i_guest_data
i_guest_data.comment: If guest is checking out, details for account

i_billcountry.name: i_billcountry
i_billcountry.comment: The country code of the billing address (used for reports).

t_partial_refund.name: t_partial_refund
t_partial_refund.comment: If transaction has been partially refunded, the amount refunded

t_auth.name: t_auth
t_auth.comment: If authorised but not captured, the auth date

t_billing_agreement.name: t_billing_agreement
t_billing_agreement.comment: If the transaction is part of a billing agreement, its ID

t_credit.name: t_credit
t_credit.comment: If transaction has been credited (refund to account credit), the amount that was credited

ps_billing_agreement.comment: If paid by a billing agreement, its ID
ps_billing_agreement.name: ps_billing_agreement

card_data.name: card_data
card_data.comment: The gateway-specific data for the card

status_log.name: status_log
status_log.comment: Should setting the status be logged?

pg_filters.name: pg_filters
pg_filters.comment: Comma-delimited list of filter IDs which apply in this group

p_email_purchase.comment: Email to send on new purchase
p_email_purchase.name: p_email_purchase

p_email_expire_soon.comment: Email to send when purchase will expire soon
p_email_expire_soon.name: p_email_expire_soon

p_email_expire.comment: Email to send when purchase expires
p_email_expire.name: p_email_expire

rlog_member.name: rlog_member
rlog_member.comment: The member ID of the staff performing the action

rlog_date.name: rlog_date
rlog_date.comment: Unix timestamp of when change was made

ba_gw_id.name: ba_gw_id
ba_gw_id.comment: The ID assigned by the gateway

ba_started.name: ba_started
ba_started.comment: Unix timestamp of when billing agreement was created

ba_next_cycle.name: ba_next_cycle
ba_next_cycle.comment: Timestamp of when the next payment will be made or NULL if there was an error last time

ba_canceled.name: ba_canceled
ba_canceled.comment: If the agreement has been canceled

session_id.name: session_id
session_id.comment: The session ID which uploaded the file

time.name: time
time.comment: Unix timestamp of when the file was uploaded

item_id.name: item_id
item_id.comment: The ID number of the item in the cart

stream_departments.comment: Comma-delimited list of department IDs or NULL for all
stream_departments.name: stream_departments

stream_statuses.comment: Comma-delimited list of status IDs or NULL for all
stream_statuses.name: stream_statuses

stream_severities.comment: Comma-delimited list of severity IDs or NULL for all
stream_severities.name: stream_severities

stream_staff.comment: Comma-delimited list of staff IDs or NULL for all
stream_staff.name: stream_staff

stream_from_email.comment: From email address, or NULL for any
stream_from_email.name: stream_from_email

stream_search_term.comment: Search term, or NULL for none
stream_search_term.name: stream_search_term

stream_started.name: stream_started
stream_started.comment: JSON array of number of hours to restrict started time to and sort direction, or NULL for no restriction

stream_last_reply.name: stream_last_reply
stream_last_reply.comment: JSON array of number of hours to restrict last reply time to and sort direction, or NULL for no restriction

stream_last_staff_reply.name: stream_last_staff_reply
stream_last_staff_reply.comment: JSON array of number of hours to restrict last staff reply time to and sort direction, or NULL for no restriction

stream_owner.comment: The ID number of the staff member who owns the stream
stream_owner.name: stream_owner

stream_last_new_reply.name: stream_last_new_reply
stream_last_new_reply.comment: JSON array of number of hours to restrict reopened time to and sort direction, or NULL for no restriction

stream_tracked.comment: Boolean value indicating if only tracked requests should be included
stream_tracked.name: stream_tracked

stream_temporary.comment: If this has not yet been saved by its owner
stream_temporary.name: stream_temporary

action.name: action
action.comment: Default action when replying to a support request

spend_amount.name: spend_amount
spend_amount.comment: Total amount spent in a specific currency

pfilter_order.name: pfilter_order
pfilter_order.comment: The position in the list of filters

pfv_filter.name: pfv_filter
pfv_filter.comment: The ID number of the filter

pfv_value.name: pfv_value
pfv_value.comment: The ID number of this value

pfv_lang.name: pfv_lang
pfv_lang.comment: The ID number of the language for this value

pfv_text.name: pfv_text
pfv_text.comment: The value (name in the specified language)

pfv_order.name: pfv_order
pfv_order.comment: The position amongst the values for this filter
